channel.description: Recent content in Speech on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: DOJ paves the way for a legal war on fact-checking
item.description: Newspapers and social media platforms that agree to deprioritize misinformation could be violating US antitrust law if they exclude rivals or lead to anticompetitive effects, the Justice Department sa
